14#ifndef NAMED_GLOBALS_H
15#define NAMED_GLOBALS_H 1
16
17/*! \file */
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/rwlock.h>
22#include <isc/log.h>
23#include <isc/net.h>
24
25#include <isccfg/aclconf.h>
26#include <isccfg/cfg.h>
27
28#include <dns/acl.h>
29#include <dns/zone.h>
30
31#include <dst/dst.h>
32
33#include <named/types.h>
34#include <named/fuzz.h>
35
36#undef EXTERN
37#undef INIT
38#ifdef NAMED_MAIN
39#define EXTERN
40#define INIT(v) = (v)
41#else
42#define EXTERN extern
43#define INIT(v)
44#endif
45
46#ifndef NAMED_RUN_PID_DIR
47#define NAMED_RUN_PID_DIR 1
48#endif
49
50EXTERN isc_mem_t * named_g_mctx INIT(NULL);
51EXTERN unsigned int named_g_cpus INIT(0);
52EXTERN unsigned int named_g_udpdisp INIT(0);
53EXTERN isc_taskmgr_t * named_g_taskmgr INIT(NULL);
54EXTERN dns_dispatchmgr_t * named_g_dispatchmgr INIT(NULL);
55EXTERN unsigned int named_g_cpus_detected INIT(1);
56
57#ifdef ENABLE_AFL
58EXTERN bool named_g_run_done INIT(false);
59#endif
60/*
61 * XXXRTH We're going to want multiple timer managers eventually. One
62 * for really short timers, another for client timers, and one
63 * for zone timers.
64 */
65EXTERN isc_timermgr_t * named_g_timermgr INIT(NULL);
66EXTERN isc_socketmgr_t * named_g_socketmgr INIT(NULL);
67EXTERN cfg_parser_t * named_g_parser INIT(NULL);
68EXTERN cfg_parser_t * named_g_addparser INIT(NULL);
69EXTERN const char * named_g_version INIT(VERSION);
70EXTERN const char * named_g_product INIT(PRODUCT);
71EXTERN const char * named_g_description INIT(DESCRIPTION);
72EXTERN const char * named_g_srcid INIT(SRCID);
73EXTERN const char * named_g_configargs INIT(CONFIGARGS);
74EXTERN const char * named_g_builder INIT(BUILDER);
75EXTERN in_port_t named_g_port INIT(0);
76EXTERN isc_dscp_t named_g_dscp INIT(-1);
77
78EXTERN named_server_t * named_g_server INIT(NULL);
79
80/*
81 * Logging.
82 */
83EXTERN isc_log_t * named_g_lctx INIT(NULL);
84EXTERN isc_logcategory_t * named_g_categories INIT(NULL);
85EXTERN isc_logmodule_t * named_g_modules INIT(NULL);
86EXTERN unsigned int named_g_debuglevel INIT(0);
87
88/*
89 * Current configuration information.
90 */
91EXTERN cfg_obj_t * named_g_config INIT(NULL);
92EXTERN const cfg_obj_t * named_g_defaults INIT(NULL);
93EXTERN const char * named_g_conffile INIT(NAMED_SYSCONFDIR
94 "/named.conf");
95EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultbindkeys INIT(NAMED_SYSCONFDIR
96 "/bind.keys");
97EXTERN const char * named_g_keyfile INIT(NAMED_SYSCONFDIR
98 "/rndc.key");
99
100EXTERN dns_tsigkey_t * named_g_sessionkey INIT(NULL);
101EXTERN dns_name_t named_g_sessionkeyname;
102EXTERN bool named_g_conffileset INIT(false);
103EXTERN cfg_aclconfctx_t * named_g_aclconfctx INIT(NULL);
104
105/*
106 * Initial resource limits.
107 */
108EXTERN isc_resourcevalue_t named_g_initstacksize INIT(0);
109EXTERN isc_resourcevalue_t named_g_initdatasize INIT(0);
110EXTERN isc_resourcevalue_t named_g_initcoresize INIT(0);
111EXTERN isc_resourcevalue_t named_g_initopenfiles INIT(0);
112
113/*
114 * Misc.
115 */
116EXTERN bool named_g_coreok INIT(true);
117EXTERN const char * named_g_chrootdir INIT(NULL);
118EXTERN bool named_g_foreground INIT(false);
119EXTERN bool named_g_logstderr INIT(false);
120EXTERN bool named_g_nosyslog INIT(false);
121EXTERN const char * named_g_logfile INIT(NULL);
122
123EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultsessionkeyfile
124 INIT(NAMED_LOCALSTATEDIR "/run/named/"
125 "session.key");
126EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultlockfile INIT(NAMED_LOCALSTATEDIR
127 "/run/named/"
128 "named.lock");
129EXTERN bool named_g_forcelock INIT(false);
130
131#if NAMED_RUN_PID_DIR
132EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultpidfile INIT(NAMED_LOCALSTATEDIR
133 "/run/named/"
134 "named.pid");
135#else
136EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultpidfile INIT(NAMED_LOCALSTATEDIR
137 "/run/named.pid");
138#endif
139
140#ifdef HAVE_DNSTAP
141EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultdnstap
142 INIT(NAMED_LOCALSTATEDIR "/run/named/"
143 "dnstap.sock");
144#else
145EXTERN const char * named_g_defaultdnstap INIT(NULL);
146#endif /* HAVE_DNSTAP */
147
148EXTERN const char * named_g_username INIT(NULL);
149
150EXTERN const char * named_g_engine INIT(NULL);
151
152EXTERN isc_time_t named_g_boottime;
153EXTERN isc_time_t named_g_configtime;
154EXTERN bool named_g_memstatistics INIT(false);
155EXTERN bool named_g_keepstderr INIT(false);
156
157EXTERN unsigned int named_g_tat_interval INIT(24*3600);
158
159#ifdef HAVE_GEOIP
160EXTERN dns_geoip_databases_t *named_g_geoip INIT(NULL);
161#endif
162
163EXTERN const char * named_g_fuzz_addr INIT(NULL);
164EXTERN isc_fuzztype_t named_g_fuzz_type INIT(isc_fuzz_none);
165
166EXTERN dns_acl_t * named_g_mapped INIT(NULL);
167
168#undef EXTERN
169#undef INIT
170
171#endif /* NAMED_GLOBALS_H */
172
